sentences.sContent: Any illness of the lungs or throat , such as asthma or a cough.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any illness of the lungs or throat , such as asthma or a cough.
sentences.sCn: 消耗病，痨病肺部或喉咙的任何一种病变，如哮喘或咳嗽。

sentences.sContent: It scares me sometimes because I do have asthma and when I walk, I do gasp for air.
sentences.sContent_eng: It scares me sometimes because I do have asthma and when I walk, I do gasp for air.
sentences.sCn: 她说：“我会担心体重，因为我有哮喘，我走路的时候总是气喘吁吁。

sentences.sContent: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.sCn: 这个问题的另一个方面是在这些群体的儿童中控制哮喘。

phrases.pCn: 支气管哮喘；支气管性气喘

trans.tranOther: a medical condition that causes difficulties in breathing
